pageContext.description: Flat triangular dagger, with midrib, and three rivets; notch near point, other wire perfect.
pageContext.associations: Found with stone hammer; 2 flint saws, 5 flint celts and a fragment of another, many smaller worked flints, a bone ornament, bodkin,,skull and other bones.
pageContext.site: England,Dorset,Upwey,Barrow on Ridgeway (No. 7),Found in the third internment in Mr. John Mayo's,barrow on the Ridgeway, near Upwey, opened August 1885.
pageContext.toSearch: Ridgeway House, The Ridgeway, Weymouth, Dorset Dt3 5qq, UK
pageContext.remarks: Owing to the way in which it has been fixed into the case, it proved impossible to take accurate measurements or to make an accurate drawing.
